channel.title: Help! please!
channel.description:
mostly all the time i try logging on to moparscape there is a message:
"Error connecting to sever. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "start sever" to make your own."
1.) what can i do to log on?
2.) when i do what this message says, nothing happens, how do i create my own sever?
if you could answer those 2 questions i will be very gratefull.

item.title: Help! please!

item.description:
@man_u_4eva9 wrote:

i dunno i have the same promblem

Read full topic

item.description:
@hotshOt wrote:

either the server really is down or your putting in the wrong ip or wrong port
